field.name: DESCRIPTION
field.value: #ENTITY_ID# - The event source ID #LOG_DATE# - The date the event was logged #TITLE# - The title #MESSAGE# - The message #URL# - URL #ENTITY# - The event registration disposition #SUBSCRIBER_NAME# - The recipient's first name #SUBSCRIBER_LAST_NAME# - The recipient's last name #SUBSCRIBER_EMAIL# - The recipient's e-mail address #SUBSCRIBER_ID# - The recipient's ID
